metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000104 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A security Bypass vulnerability exists in the FcgidPassHeader Proxy in mod_fcgid through 2016-07-07.

notes.note: iconstantin> Apache provided that the fix for this issue against httpd (CVE-2016-5387) also mitigates all risks for CGI's which are invoked by mod_fcgid.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-fcgid package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
